data.text: @the_coups @Ptbohealth Dumb logic..cant fix stupid I guess.
@drzdave58 @Ptbohealth Nah, I think your scientifically illiterate take is whatâ€™s funny, pal. Bet you think kids wearing life jackets or helmets are child abuse, too.
@the_coups @Ptbohealth Nice to see u think child abuse is funny.

@Ptbohealth What are the isolation requirements for the person who tests positive? What would I be required to do today? How will that change as of Mar 21, and how will it change as of April 27? Thanks!
@Ptbohealth PPH should be charged with child abuse for forcing children to wear these useless harmful masks.

@gramshelper @twpiggott Residents who have a health condition that would make them immunocompromised or who are on immunosuppressant medication are eligible for a fourth dose at least 3 months (12 weeks) after their third dose.

@Ptbohealth @twpiggott Should I be trying to book my 90 year old Mom's 4th shot? Her 3rd was December 15th. With masks being eliminated on the 21st I would love to be able to take her shopping before Easter. We all will still wear ours but I want to keep her safe.

@Ptbohealth I've been asking you for 2yrs to provide the links to the studies proving masks effective. Your answer is "we're following the Ministry's guidlines". Now the ministry is lifting the mask mandate and you're not "following the guidlines",encouraging the public to continue wearing?
@JonDoh12345 @Ptbohealth You couldn't be more wrong if you tried, nameless troll account.
